meanings.sent1: The incandescences of the bonfire lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The incandescences of the light bulb brightened the room.
meanings.sent3: The incandescences of the fireflies made the garden look magical.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had an incandescence that warmed everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The incandescences of the fireworks painted colorful patterns in the sky.

meanings.definition: The emission of light as a result of being heated.
meanings.sent1: The incandescences from the hot metal were blinding.
meanings.sent2: The incandescences from the campfire flickered in the darkness.
meanings.sent3: The incandescences from the toaster made the bread pop up too soon.
meanings.sent4: The incandescences of the stars guided the lost travelers.
meanings.sent5: The incandescences of the lava flowed like rivers of light.
